otherNightReminder: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the "Is the Plague Doctor" reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.
If the Storyteller gains the Baron ability, up to two players become out-of-play Outsiders.

If the Demon has a neighbor who is alive and a Townsfolk or Outsider when the Plague Doctor dies, that player becomes an evil Marionette. If there is already an extra evil player, this does not happen.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Spy ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
